text: Aur aap inn ko nooh (alh-e-salam) ka qissa parh ker sunaiye jab kay unhon ney apni qom say farmaya kay aey meri qom! Agar tum ko mera rehna aur ehkaam-e-elahi ki naseehat kerna bhari maloom hota hai to mera to Allah hi per bharosa hai. Tum apni tadbeer maaye apney shurka kay pukhta kerlo phir tumhari tadbeer tumhari ghuttan ka baees nahi honi chahaiye. Aur phir meray sath ker guzro aur mujh ko mohlat na do
